Member Function Documentation

void BlueSkyPositionIndicatorView::DrawPositionIndicator (  const PositionIndicator &  pos_ind,
DeviceContext *  dc,
const Rect &  repaint_rect
)  const [protected, virtual]
 

Draws the data of a position indicator described by the model. Must be implemented in the corresponding theme view.

Parameters:
pos_ind Position-Indicator which should be drawn.
dc Pointer to the device context, where the drawing should be done.
repaint_rect Rectangle which indicates, where the repainting must be done.

Implements PositionIndicatorView.
